tutor.name: Aqsa Perwez
tutor.bio: Hallo! I’m Aqsa, your German tutor (and yes, German grammar can make sense). I studied German at Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), New Delhi, and am currently pursuing my Master’s in German there. I am TestDaF certified and teach German up to C1 level concepts without unnecessary confusion or textbook overload. My classes are structured and interactive, focused on real progress like speaking with confidence, understanding grammar instead of memorizing it, and actually enjoying the process. I teach using an iPad based method with clear notes and explanations, because messy screenshots are not a learning strategy. If you are serious about learning German and slightly tired of overcomplicated explanations, you are in the right place.

courses.tagline: Build a strong foundation in German
courses.description: Ideal for beginners who want a solid foundation in German. This course covers A1 and A2 levels and helps you move from basic sentences to everyday conversations with confidence.

courses.tagline: Start your German journey from scratch
courses.description: Perfect for complete beginners with no prior knowledge of German. Learn basic vocabulary, pronunciation, and essential grammar to introduce yourself and handle simple everyday situations.
HA complete course for serious learners who want to progress from beginner to intermediate level. Covers A1, A2, and B1 with structured guidance and consistent practice.
Designed for learners who already know basic German and want to improve fluency. Focuses on speaking, sentence structure, and using German more naturally in real life.

testimonials.name: Rohit Verma
testimonials.text: I started with zero knowledge of German and was honestly scared of grammar. Aqsa explains concepts very clearly and patiently.

testimonials.name: Sneha Kulkarni
testimonials.text: I tried learning German earlier from YouTube but always got confused. Here, the concepts were explained clearly and the regular speaking practice helped a lot. The iPad notes also made revision simple.

testimonials.name: Sadiq Ali
testimonials.text: Preparing for my move to Dresden, I needed to reach B1 quickly. Aqsa's structured approach and practice scenarios got me job ready.

testimonials.name: Neha Sharma
testimonials.text: I was preparing for the German language exam and needed clarity, not shortcuts. The classes helped me understand grammar properly and practise speaking in an exam oriented way. I passed the Goethe B1 exam, and the structured approach made preparation much less stressful.
